body: @ustcweizhou  I think we dont need to fix issue at the framework level, as there is other way of addressing the same, though i have not chosen to do that.  The scenario of setting it back to null only comes in the case of removed field in few cases. So we can either remove the REMOVED_COLUMN annotation  and set the value when needed to be set or remove the Attribute.Flag.DaoGenerated option from REMOVED_COLUMN and set the value in all set scenarios.
@karuturi thanks for merging, just a note that merging from UI does not automatically fwd-merge the branch. Please do that too thanks :)
@blueorangutan test
@borisstoyanov a Trillian-Jenkins test job (centos7 mgmt + kvm-centos7) has been kicked to run smoke tests
@rhtyd the PR has the ticket id so the merge commit will as well. Is that not enough?

Can someone suggest an more appropriate url?  I need a modern template to run parts of the test, something new enough to have support out of the box for virtio scsi.

@rhtyd Hi Rohit, as I remember, this is a regress issue after VR refactoring in 4.6
We had this issue at the beginning, and fixed it by another way.

```
root@r-8441-VM:~# ip route show table Table_eth2
default via 10.11.115.254 dev eth2
throw 10.1.43.0/24  proto static
10.11.115.0/24 dev eth2  scope link
root@r-8441-VM:~# ip route show table Table_eth3
default via 10.11.107.254 dev eth3
throw 10.1.43.0/24  proto static
10.11.107.0/24 dev eth3  scope link
```

The line 'throw 10.1.43.0/24  proto static' does not exist in 4.6+, after the the following commands in VR, it should work.
```
ip route add table Table_eth2 throw 10.1.43.0/24  proto static
ip route add table Table_eth3 throw 10.1.43.0/24  proto static
```
